DOC.brief_summary: This observational study is conducted in North America. The aim of this observational study is to evaluate the incidence of adverse events while using Levemir速 under normal clinical practice conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study to Evaluate the Safety of Levemir速 in Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 1 or 2 diabetes Including newly diagnosed not on insulin or insulin analogue treatment Selection at the discretion of the physician Adult patients with type 1 and 2 diabetes mellitus, and type 1 patients 6 years and older Current treatment with Levemir速 Previously enrolled in the study Hypersensitivity to Levemir速
